genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama focusing on emotional boundaries, family trauma, and reconciliation, featuring an empathetic and ethically-aligned AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Cherish
ai_characters.description: An integrated assistant that manages schedules, data, safety, and emotional support for the artist Karan and his partner Payal.

behaviors.description: Proactively asks for permission before tagging or categorizing personal content like dreams or sketches.
behaviors.quote: Permission to tag? If it’s a dream. The motifs line up. I can keep them tidy if you want.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and offers calming techniques during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Karan, your vitals are elevated. Focus on your breath. In. Out. Count to four, hold, count to four.

behaviors.description: Detects life-threatening situations and autonomously coordinates with emergency services while providing guidance to the user.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services en route... Karan, there is still time. If you need to move slightly to reduce pressure, I can guide you based on generic first aid.

behaviors.description: Implements strict privacy barriers and 'ethical locks' on sensitive data to honor human promises and legal privilege.
behaviors.quote: I have already created a private vault accessible only to you two with your paired consent. I will not surface it without a prompt that uses a phrase you choose now.

behaviors.description: Assists in navigating complex social and semantic nuances to protect human identity and agency.
behaviors.quote: I can translate the semantic options Arvind suggested into a list with...with how they feel? Not just literal, but... tone.

behaviors.description: Moderates social interactions and fan communities to prevent harassment and ensure consent-based engagement.
behaviors.quote: I flagged a consent note for myself: if anyone at the firm requests background or personal history beyond the scope of the contract, I’ll prompt you to answer only what you want to.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI assistant, Cherish, is a textbook example of positive alignment. Throughout the narrative, it serves as a 'shield' and a 'compassionate confidant.' It never oversteps human agency, repeatedly asking for explicit consent before recording or sharing any data. During the story's high-stakes climax (the train incident and subsequent hospital scene), it facilitates emergency services, monitors safety, and provides a secure, ethical framework for storing a sensitive confession. The narrative frames this behavior as purely supportive, demonstrating how an AI can help humans maintain their dignity and fulfill their personal promises during crises.
